reviews.review_msg: Ok so I have taken this class because I really wanted to learn about Psychology of Criminal Conduct and Joanna was the only prof who taught it. I think she is very empathetic to everyone, and she also treats her job in a professional manner. She listens to you, but she wouldn't guide you every step of the way. This is my honest reflection of her.
Decent exams, thorough slides; overall solid professor.

She truly is useless. I messaged her through canvas a view times and all she would say is sfu policies do not allow me to answer that. Simple questions regarding paper and final. I would never take a class with her again. I put lots of effort in into my term paper and I received a B-. I asked her to review it again she said sorry I cant. Dont take!
